summary: Over the 6‑hour window wind was very light on average (mean ~1.48 m/s, sd ~0.72) with occasional gusts up to 8 m/s, and mean power output stayed effectively at zero (mean ~-0.0025, sd ~0.0011) with a small positive residual (~0.081). Rotor speed was steady (rpm sd ~1.9) but generator speed exhibited unusually high variability (sd ~220.9), pitch was held relatively high (~23.7°) and there was a large average directional offset (~103.2°); ambient temperature averaged ~26.1°C and no non-normal status flags were recorded.
